医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的基因开关可能会导致代谢疾病的精确治疗ETH研究人员开发了一种新的基因开关，可以使用应用于皮肤的市售硝酸甘油斑块来激活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/new-gene-switch-may-lead-to-to-precise-treatments-foreatments-for-metabolic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/new-gene-switch-may-lead-to-to-precise-wartments-for-metabolic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df3cc108-b74b-4c62-b76a-1696ced39b3f Mon, 17 Feb 2025 08:29:54 -0500 New gene switch may lead to precise treatments for metabolic diseases
在心脏中发现的甜味受体会影响心跳在一个令人惊讶的发现中，科学家发现心脏具有“甜味”受体，类似于我们的舌头上的受体，而用甜物质刺激这些受体可以调节心跳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/sweet-taste-receptors-found-in-the-heart-could-could-foct-facl-shertbeat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/sweet-taste-receptors-found-in-the-heart-could-could-could-could-affect-herntbeat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b7ca1E2-698A-4328-AA71-AA71-422BFEA307CE Mon, 17 Feb 2025 07:59:54 -0500 Sweet taste receptors found in the heart could affect heartbeat
斯坦福大学的研究人员确定了与遗传性癌症风险相关的关键变体构成人类基因组的核苷酸的数千个单一变化与患癌症的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/stanford-researchers-isendify-nistify-key-variants-linked to-inherity-cancer-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/stanford-researchers-isendify-nistify-key-variants-link-链接到inserit-inserit-cancer-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e586c866660-9160-46fd-8f76-9fe85f5e073c Mon, 17 Feb 2025 07:57:22 -0500 Stanford researchers identify key variants linked to inherited cancer risk
突破性技术可以使mRNA在血脑屏障上传递西奈山医学院的科学家开发了一种脂质纳米颗粒系统，能够通过静脉注射将信使RNA（mRNA）传递到大脑，这一挑战长期以来受到血脑屏障的保护性的限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/breakthrough-technology-enables-enables-mrna-delivery-delivery-across-the-blood-brain-brain-brain-barrier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/breakthrough-technology-enables-mrna-delivery-mrna-delivery-across-the-blood-brain-brain-brain-barrier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=358023da-e7a4-4287-b8eb-daf75209a36b Mon, 17 Feb 2025 07:18:07 -0500 Breakthrough technology enables mRNA delivery across the blood-brain barrier
ICHOM开发定义心脏瓣膜疾病结果的标准数据集根据今天在《治疗方法》（手术或经导管程序）中，国际健康结果测量联盟（ICHOM）已开发了一个全球包含的标准数据集，该数据集对心脏瓣膜疾病患者进行了16种以患者为中心的结果指标。美国心脏协会的杂志流通：心血管质量和结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ichom-develops-dandard-dataset-dataset-that-defines-hert-valve-disease-ustcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ichom-develops-dandard-dataset-dataset-that-defines-hert-valve-disease-comes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e5ffc1b-1162-4c37-8c9b-986602c263a0 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 05:56:24 -0500 ICHOM develops standard dataset that defines heart valve disease outcomes
治疗犬帮助一年级学生应对压力，抑郁和焦虑治疗狗计划在支持大学生的心理健康方面表现出希望，从而减少了第一学期的焦虑和抑郁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/Therapy-dogs-help-first-year-students-cope-with-stress-depression-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/therapy-dogs-help-fir-fir--fir------------------------------cope-with-with-with-with-stress-depression-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04CDC68C-8091-4A85-A85-A1AC-FF34460B0086 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 05:44:00 -0500 Therapy dogs help first-year students cope with stress, depression, and anxiety
AI可以成为您的治疗师吗？研究表明，在关键领域的ChatGpt优于专业人士AI辅助心理保健正在发展，Chatgpt-4在同理心和文化能力方面的表现优于治疗师，从而提高了对心理治疗的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/can-ai-be-be-your-therapist-study-shows-chatgpt-chatgpt-pperforpersperformes-proferforsals-professionals-inkey-key-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/can-ai-be-be-your-therapist-study-shows-chatgpt-chatgpt-pperforpers-proferforms-professionals-professionals-inkey-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=606087da-4216-4216-4deb-82CD-9EB469402E3A Mon, 17 Feb 2025 05:20:00 -0500 Can AI be your therapist? Study shows ChatGPT outperforms professionals in key areas
改变我们对一个人的看法可以减少孤独感吗？研究人员发现，负面的媒体描绘单独通过塑造有害的信念来增加孤独感，而积极的刻画会减少孤独感，这是九个国家 /地区观察到的模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250216/can-changing-how-we-we-we-think-about-bout-being-being-alone-reduce-loneliness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250216/can-changing-how-we-we-think-tink-about-being-being-alone-reduce-loneliness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A77F2D8-4C81-4887-BA3C-76FB2E418D12 Sun, 16 Feb 2025 23:52:00 -0500 Can changing how we think about being alone reduce loneliness?
肥胖和认知：令人惊讶的研究将较高的BMI与更好的记忆联系起来成年和中年的BMI较高，与更好的记忆表现有关，尤其是在男性和黑人美国人中，挑战了传统的肥胖和认知观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250216/obesity-and-cognition-sognition-scognition-srprising-study-links-links-nigher-bmi-bmi-bmi-to-better-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250216/obesity-and-cognition-scognition-scognition-srprising-study-links-links-nigher-bmi-bmi-bmi-to-better-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=200C9FA9-A295-4F8D-B801-7B1CFD9C8B89 Sun, 16 Feb 2025 23:22:00 -0500 Obesity and cognition: Surprising study links higher BMI to better memory
糖尿病药物可能会提高大脑健康，但专家警告风险研究人员回顾了374项研究，以探讨最初用于糖尿病的GLP-1RA如何影响大脑健康，发现痴呆症的潜在益处和成瘾，但对情绪障碍的结果不一致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250216/diabetes-drugs-may-boost-boost-brain-health-health-health-brat-experts-warn-farn-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250216/diabetes-drugs-may-boost-boost-brain-health-health-health-health-brut-experts-warn-warn-farn-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0da13E1B-1DF1-4662-B9D7-5D8008B096F8 Sun, 16 Feb 2025 23:01:00 -0500 Diabetes drugs may boost brain health but experts warn of risks
